question: Which country unveils the worldis biggest flag recently?
explanation: Bolivia unveiled its 200 km long flag, which it claims to be the worldis biggest flag. The flag extends between the cities La Paz and Oruro. It is made of blue cloth and features Bolivian national symbols. Its width is three meters. Bolivian people held the flag as a sign of support for Boliviais claim for access to the Pacific coast. Bolivia demands access to the Pacific Ocean, which it lost to Chile in a war in the 19th century. Bolivia will present its case demanding access to Chileis Pacific coast at the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on 19th March 2018.
